column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=After a long day at work , the thing I want and love the most is a hot bath .
#text=I like to run the water very hot !
#text=I like bubbles added , the kind that smell like mangoes .
#text=I pour a glass of wine while the water runs , and bring it with me into the bathroom .
#text=Once the tub is full , I finally allow myself to get in .
#text=I lay back and let the hours of work just slip away .
#text=Sometimes I 'll bring a book in with me and sink into a good story as the hot water dulls away any aches and pains .
#text=I sip on my wine and enjoy the soft popping bubbles around me .
#text=When I have finally had enough , I 'll slowly drain the tub , and then get up and dry off with a huge fluffy towel .
#text=After taking a bath I always feel refreshed and relaxed !
